data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pitts, James P., Sadler, Emily (2017): Association and description of the male of Aplochares imitator (Smith) (Hymenoptera: Pompilidae). Zootaxa 4300 (1): 135-141, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4300.1.8|3 occurrences
